title: Historical Stats of Champion Content
body:
Kai'sa was the 140th Champion released and Irelia had the 89th official rework so I thought I'd put together some charts showing the history of League of Legends Champion content.

# Eras of Champion Releases

[Total Champion Content over Time](https://i.imgur.com/e11kmj7.png)

Looking at this chart there are 3 distinct eras of League champion release.

**(Release - 2010):** Rapid *E X P A N S I O N* - The game started off with 17 champions and needed more to stay interesting.
**(2010 - 2013):** Steady growth - Champions were released at a constant rate of about 1 champ per patch (~14 days).
**(2013 - ?):** Slow down - Champion releases slowed down to focus on quality. At the same time the number of reworks increased. Riot has said recently they'll be increasing the number of VGUs and decreasing releases so maybe we're at the beginning of another era.

# Analyzing Rate of Content

[Rate of Content (Smoothed over 3 instances)](https://i.imgur.com/InJK73t.png)

**Marked Points of Interest**

**Fastest Release Rate(2009-09-19):** The 8 champions from Gangplank to Katarina took 43 days to release.
**Slowest Release Rate(2014-08-14):** Vel'Koz, Braum and Gnar took 244 days to release.

**Fastest Rework Rate(2016-09-08):** The 16 mages in the mage update, Yorick and one of the Ryze updates took 142 days.
**Slowest Rework Rate(2012-01-16):** Tryndamere, Sivir and Jax reworks took 266 days.

**Fastest Combined Rate(2016-05-18):** Taric Rework, Mage update and Taliyah's Release took 55 days.
**Slowest Combined Rate(2018-03-07):** Zoe, Swain's Rework and Kai'sa took 148 days.

Also fun to note, that giant dip at the end of 2009-beginning of 2010 is Riot's first Christmas break after the release of League of Legends :)

#Extras

[Non-Smoothed Rate of Content](https://i.imgur.com/A58jJfw.png)

I've also marked the maxes and mins on this chart and the only ones that drastically change from the smoothed version are:

**Slowest Release Rate(2018-03-07):** Kai'Sa was released 106 days after Zoe.

**Slowest Rework Rate(2013-03-27):** The Karma rework happened 225 days after the Katarina rework.
